backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling contact submissions, appointment requests, admin-only domain drafts, and decommission mode with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI background-image feature to relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose of major frontend pages, components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, branding, favicon assets, and the root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup defining all main routes and wrapping them in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Form component for submitting appointment requests with validation, React Query mutation, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Validated contact form using React Query to submit data and display success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component showing branding, contact info, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, branding, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper composing the site header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines the hospital name and a helper to format page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Central contact details config with helpers to retrieve phone numbers and tel links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: Empty placeholder file for a future domain draft hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and utilities for login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Mutation hook to submit appointment requests via the backend actor with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page setting document title and rendering sections for mission, vision, values, and features.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Displays a hero section, appointment process steps, and an appointment request form with page title set on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details and a contact form, including phone, email, address, and hours, with page title set on mount.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Renders an alert indicating the site is decommissioned and no longer accepting submissions.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Lists doctors with specialties, credentials, and availability, alongside a hero section and styled doctor cards.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Provides emergency service information, call-to-action button, and service feature cards with page title set on mount.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero content, emergency services highlight, and navigation buttons for booking appointments and viewing services.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a 404 page with a message and button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page rendering a services list with icons, hero section, and grid layout, setting the page title on mount.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for getting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, issues, and feature requests related to adding uploaded images as profile backgrounds.
